data.title: TrueBrew™ Oktoberfest Ingredient Kit
data.meta_description: The Oktoberfest celebration in Germany has been held annually for over two hundred years. But the reason for its survival isn't to honor the marriage of Prince Ludwig and Therese of Saxe-Hildburghausen. It's because of the beer! Our Oktoberfest is a full-bodied lager, crimson-amber in color and richly malty, backed by noble German hops. Continue the celebration and raise a stein!
data.text:
The Oktoberfest celebration in Germany has been held annually for over two hundred years. But the reason for its survival isn't to honor the marriage of Prince Ludwig and Therese of Saxe-Hildburghausen. It's because of the beer! Our Oktoberfest is a full-bodied lager, crimson-amber in color and richly malty, backed by noble German hops. Continue the celebration and raise a stein!

Ingredients/Contents

Specialty Grain, Crushed

8 oz Weyermann® Melanoidin Malt

Fermentables

1 × 3.3 lb can Amber LME

2 × 1 lb Light DME

Hops & Flavorings

2 oz Liberty Hop Pellets

Yeast

6 g Muntons Ale Yeast

Other

5 oz Priming Sugar

Muslin Bag

Instruction Sheet (Preview)
